abstractText: These two palm-leaf folios contain verses from two Buddhist stotras, the end of the Narakoddhārastotra (Narakodhanastotra in the colophon) and the beginning of Āryāvalokiteśvarasya Karuṇāstava.
abstractShort: These two palm-leaf folios contain verses from two Buddhist stotras, the end of the Narakoddhārastotra (Narakodhanastotra
title: Narakoddhārastotra, Āryāvalokiteśvarasya Karuṇāstava
